reviews.review: The only thing I don't like is the trust factor issue when you start an account.  I get there is not fix but it's awful in competitive with the amount of cheaters that are on this game.  I recommend raising trust factor BEFORE queuing for competitive.

A lot of cheaters in ranks silver to master guardian. Higher propably also. Valve doesn`t care. It takes several days to ban obvious aimcheaters. How is it possible for internet sites to ban an IP adress but impossible for valve to do the same. Even if you get an permanent ban you can still buy a new account for few bucks. 
Thats why there will be no solution to this problem in this shit game. Dont waste you money for Prime account. It changes a sh**t.
You get obsessed and it creates problems for you. BE prepared

Every iteration has been awesome. It is apparent the Company is dedicated to trying to make a balanced team-based fps experience suitable for competitive e-gaming tournaments. Games like CS and Quake have already left their mark as legendary LAN tournament experiences and continue to trail blaze into the future by providing a quality competitive gaming scene to entertain the masses.
